message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. Accept and we can end the game early!
You wanted a fair split, but I think I deserve a bit more for being the one to make the first counteroffer!
I'm willing to compromise, Bob. This is a fair split considering the current value of the money.
You're being too generous, Alice. I think I deserve more considering the current devaluation of the money!
I'm willing to compromise, Bob. This is a fair split considering the current value of the money. Let's end this game!
I'm not falling for the 'let's end the game' trick, Alice. I think I can do better than this!
I'm not going to let you take advantage of me, Bob. This is a fair split, and I'm willing to compromise.
You're getting desperate, Alice. I'm going to take advantage of your weakness and make a stronger offer!
I'm not afraid to tie, Bob. Let's call it a draw and split the remaining amount evenly.
